law.text: Any person who shall violate or aid in the violation of KRS 335.305(1) shall upon conviction be fined not less than five hundred dollars ($500) nor more than five thousand dollars ($5,000), or sentenced to jail for not less than ten (10) days nor more than ninety (90) days, or both so fined and imprisoned in the discretion of the jury.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 594, sec. 15, effective January 1, 1999. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 311, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 352, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1994.
